body_html:
Hi praveeny1986@ the best way for now is to use CudnnCompatibleLSTM for inference. See example here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cudnn_rnn/python/layers/cudnn_rnn.py#L104
body_text:
Hi praveeny1986@ the best way for now is to use CudnnCompatibleLSTM for inference. See example here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cudnn_rnn/python/layers/cudnn_rnn.py#L104
body:
Hi praveeny1986@ the best way for now is to use ```CudnnCompatibleLSTM``` for inference. See example here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cudnn_rnn/python/layers/cudnn_rnn.py#L104
